Class MoteurEditionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • receiver.MoteurEditionImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoteurEdition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoteurEditionEnregistrable

    public class MoteurEditionImpl
extends java.util.Observable
implements MoteurEdition
    Cette classe implémente l'interface MoteurEdition du Design Pattern Command
    Version:
    V1 - 30/11/2015
    Author:
    Sanaa Mairouch / Frédéric Rochard
